alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:50AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL, WEST CENTRAL GRANT, NORTHERN OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 315 AM EDT... At 249 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Madison to 10 miles north of Frankfort, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Vevay, Warsaw, Owenton, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Pleasant, Glencoe, Fairview, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Center Square, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 52, Interstate 71 at US Route 127, Markland, Avonburg, New Liberty, Mount Sterling, Jacksonville and US Route 42 at State Route 184. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 51 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
